attributes.action: Have a new referendum on EU membership
attributes.additional_details: I believe the decision made by many people who voted to leave the EU in 2016 was based on misinformation. Furthermore, I believe the world has significantly changed its political balance and that traditional protection alliances have been proven unreliable. I think the UK needs more than ever to re-establish strong trading, policing and military ties with our nearest neighbours. I believe that for the future safety of our nation we require a brave government who will offer a chance to reconsider.
attributes.background: I want the government to offer the people of the UK a further opportunity to reconsider the position of our communities leaving the EU.
